original_query: SELECT MIN(v.Id) FROM votes as v, posts as p, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = v.UserId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.Score>=0 AND p.Score<=30 AND p.CommentCount=0 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 15:30:31' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-04 17:45:10' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) <= 30 AND posts.CommentCount = 0 AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 15:30:31' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-04 17:45:10')
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4.OwnerUserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E4E3.OwnerUserId)
